column2:
"Being able to devour the souls of the soulless was a rare treat. My hands won't forget this feeling...
Thank you."

"When you suddenly started screaming, I wondered if something was wrong with you...
It was just your battle mania, though."
"I got some good results too. I've figured out an expression that converts the curvature of the spacial erosion created when Darkers teleport into subspace coordinates."

"That's all I needed for the software. Now all that's left is the hardware...
The main body of the machine still needs to be put together. I'll let you know if I need your help again."
